org.wonderly.util.jini2
Class RemoteActionThread<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.util.jini2.RemoteActionThread<T>

public abstract class RemoteActionThread<T>
extends Object

This class provides a Remote friendly container of the SwingWorker functionality. It utilizes the ComponentUpdateThread class which provides automatic disabling of components during the remote actions. This Object is designed to be long lived. Each time start() is called, a new ComponentUpdateThread is created to interface with the delegated-to methods in this class. This class is similar to ComponentUpdateThread except that it allows the construct() method to throw an exception that will be reported through the reportException(Throwable).
